text: The Alpina B3 is a line of high-performance compact executive cars manufactured by the German car manufacturer Alpina, which is based on the BMW 3 Series of the car manufacturer BMW. It is made, inter alia, as a sedan (two- and four-door), Touring and Cabriolet. With the exception of the Cabriolet, each model is also optionally available with four-wheel drive. The current diesel variant runs under Alpina D3 Biturbo. *Alpina B3 (E90) *Alpina B3 (F30) B3
title: Alpina B3
